message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I believe it would be incredibly beneficial for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have. Given its value, I'm offering it at $14,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13,500?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $13,500 is lower than I'd like to go. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $14,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I'm still looking to keep the cost below $14,000. Could we possibly agree on $13,800?
Hi Bob, it seems like we're getting close.  I value your interest in this product and I want to make this work. How about we settle at $13,900?
